data.name: Easy Game Creator
data.detailed_description:
The Unique Gift Creator


Chocolates are routine and ordinary. Flowers wilt in days and need to be ordered days or weeks in advance. The recipient will receive a fully playable video-game, where they are the main character. The game world is built with them as the star. Include friends' and family member’s names in the game to make it a fun, one-of-a-kind, experience they can cherish forever.


We want to hear about your experience!

Be sure to jump over to the Steam Community Forums to let us know what you thought about our software.
Were you able to create the perfect game gift? Did you run into any issues with the software? What did you think about the gameplay and scenarios available? Let us know what you think!


About the Software

Pick your theme
This determines the overall setting for your game, changing the visual to available cut-scenes. Each theme comes with a convenient story and order events that you can use as a base. You can completely change every aspect of this story or order events so you can be as creative as you want!


Add your family and friends
Include as many of your friends and family as characters in your game. Make them a hero, villain, magician, comical bad guy, or one of many other options.



Choose from multiple scenarios, backdrops and gameplay
Pick from multiple game elements to truly customize the experience. Have your characters go on a walk, share some friendly banter, defend themselves from hordes of enemies, and use relatable images to tell your unique story!



Add custom dialog with sounds and emotes
Completely customize the story with extra flare! Add as many lines of dialog to any cutscene you want, with character emotes and multiple sounds to choose from. Don't forget to add in multiple inside jokes to truly make this experience memorable!



Share your unique experience instantly!
In just a few clicks, share your game instantly to your friends and family so they can play it on any HTML5 compatible web browser. Shared games are hosted on a private URL that you can send digitally to anyone, anywhere!



Frequently Asked Questions

How can I download the game?
There’s no need to! After building your game you will be given a link you can easily share. Your game will be played right inside the web browser on any computer or mobile device.

How many games do I get?
Each purchase lets you create 2 built games to send to loved ones. Additional built games can be purchased.

Where and how can the game be played?
The game you create will be playable on any smartphone, computer, or tablet.

Will the game be delivered immediately, or can I have it delivered on a specific day?
We create a shareable link that you can send to them through email at any time you want.

Do I need any programming skills to build this game?
Absolutely not! Just fill out a short questionnaire, and the game will be created for you.

How long will it take from start to finish?
Most people can create their gift in less than fifteen minutes.

How will they receive my gift?
You will receive a link you can share with them through email, or online chat.

Where and how can the game be created?
After purchase, install Easy Game Creator, fill out the questionnaire, and the program does all of the heavy lifting.

data.short_description: Create a unique one-of-a-kind video game gift made in minutes, by you, with no programming skills required. Turn your friends or family into the main characters in their own video game. Simply share your game and instantly enjoy playing it on any computer, phone, or tablet.
